quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: It is action that creates motivation.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: I don't think it's a Western thing to really talk about intrinsic motivation and the drive for autonomy, mastery and purpose. You have to not be struggling for survival. For people who don't know where their next meal is coming, notions of finding inner motivation are comical.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: Self-Motivation [10w] "Today I'll do something more extraordinarythan I did yesterday.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: Once you can let go of illusion and draw upon a more universal source of motivation then you will re connect with your true purpose on Earth.
author: Gary Markwick

quote: Inspiration fires you up; motivation keeps you burning.
author: Stuart Aken

quote: Many of the factors that we think will cause motivation, such as fair pay and a good manager, won't make you love your job. Even if you eliminate what makes you dissatisfied, that doesn't make you motivated. It doesn't make your work rewarding. You just are less bothered by things.
author: Clayton Christensen

quote: Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis.
author: Zig Ziglar,  Raising Positive Kids in a Negative World

quote: If you're bored with life - you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things - you don't have enough goals.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: My motivation and aspiration is the same, being number one or being number five. So that's the truth. And my goal is the same - it's to always be happy playing, it's to enjoy the game and improve always.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: Inspiration is external and motivation is internal. It is up to me to provide the switch and you to flip it on!
author: Tricia Cunningham,  The Reverse Diet: Lose 20, 50, 100 Pounds or More by Eating Dinner for Breakfast and Breakfast for Dinner

quote: Money. The ultimate motivation. The ultimate way of keeping score.
author: Michael Connelly,  Chasing the Dime

quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: The living self has one purpose only: to come into its own fullness of being.
author: D.H. Lawrence,  Selected Essays

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: If you decide not to take action, you are going to fail, and even if you do take action, if you can’t keep up your motivation, you will simply end up back where you started.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.
author: Pat Riley

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: I don't know what keeps me going. Sometimes I wonder... I think it's just pure perseverance and wanting to succeed and having that burning desire to always have success.
author: Tanya Tucker

quote: It is hard not to feel that there must be something very wrong with much of what we do in school, if we feel the need to worry so much about what many people call 'motivation'. A child has no stronger desire than to make sense of the world, to move freely in it, to do the things that he sees bigger people doing.
author: John Holt

quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: You solely owe success and happiness to yourself. So why not make your inner-self proud of your daily decisions and actions?
author: Edmond Mbiaka

quote: I think it all comes down to motivation. If you really want to do something, you will work hard for it.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: I've been surrounded by a lot of people who felt that external success would result in them feeling good about themselves. But it just seems extremely unfulfilling to me.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

quote: In life, you need either inspiration or desperation.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
author: Marianne Vos

quote: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.
author: Deborah Day

quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Passion for knowledge, motivation for continuous learning.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: Inspiration comes from so many sources. Music, other fiction, the non-fiction I read, TV shows, films, news reports, people I know, stories I hear, misheard words or lyrics, dreams... Motivation? The memory of the rush I get from a really good writing session - even on a bad day, I know I'll find that again if I keep going.
author: Trudi Canavan

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Feed your self-esteem; not your ego!
author: Deborah Brodie

quote: Dissatisfaction can be a source of inspiration if you learn to control it.
author: Tadahiko Nagao
